TopicTitle: I'm Waiting for 0.24 to Download... Now What?

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

0.24 might take a little while to come out, and I'm sure you want something to do whilst waiting. Because I'm sure many will be glued to their monitors all day today.

So...

Please use this thread to post your favorite KSP designs, videos, screenshots, fanart, writing, or anything else that can keep peoples' minds off the upcoming 0.24 release!

(Please don't refresh so often, either. KSP almost certainly isn't coming out right now.)

Here, I'll start with some of my good ol' KSP videos...

I look forwards to what y'all have in your inventories! (And I look forwards to the drop in blood pressure that this thread will hopefully bring.)

Enjoy!

Edited July 17, 2014 by UpsilonAerospace
I don't even grammar.

Hi! I talked with a mod and this thread is now unlocked.

Just be sure to not speculate on 0.24. Also, if you have images, only post one or two at a time. KSP's servers are compromised enough right now.

Have fun!

so this is our official .24 waiting thread? woohoo!

i suggest watching Code Geass to fill your time. its my favorite anime of all time. its a thinker like Deathnote if you've seen that.

Hey, over here! Selling tickets for the #HYPETRAIN over on this thread! Come on over for fun, games, food, drink and a LOT of hype.

Just stay away from those guys with foaming mouths. They have Hype Overload Syndrome.

Edited July 17, 2014 by FCISuperGuy

Don't give in to the hype! Just keep your blood pressure at reasonable levels and everything will be just fine.

Hakuna matata! Hakuna matata!

Hey, I've achieved SEVEN SIDED simmetry with a similar procedure:

EDIT also eleven!!

EDIT there's no limit!!!!

Edited July 17, 2014 by PlonioFludrasco

so this is our official .24 waiting thread? woohoo!

i suggest watching Code Geass to fill your time. its my favorite anime of all time. its a thinker like Deathnote if you've seen that.

Nope, this thread was meant to share your favorite videos, images, mission logs and other things to keep your mind off 0.24. The 'waiting room' thread where you can discuss the update is sticky'd in this forum.

While I'm waiting, I'm playing a FB pirate game waiting for their monthly event/raid starts in a few hours. Good thing I can use dual screens today lol.

Edit: I've also been continuing with kurent KSP save, got most of the science from the mun, just got a scan sat/kethane sat into minmus orbit and working on building a science ship/kethane mine to go to minmus as well.

Edited July 17, 2014 by Sma

Whilst waiting, check out the latest pictures from the Rosetta probe mission - http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-28351234

Actual piccys of the rock they're planning to land on, from 12,000km out. It's rather spinny. And looks like a space duck.

Edited July 17, 2014 by MiniMatt
I'm still new to KSP so I'm actively playing. Working on efficient rocket designs and playing with spaceplanes. Both seem will be important for .24

We should change title of this thread to "Anything BUT 0.24"

How about this to distract you?

Let's Preview Elite: Dangerous!

Also, I've been playing a lot of Spore lately.
Would be playing DF to keep my mind off it, but DF2014 is still a hot mess.

Heh. I love how despite all other waiting threads becoming irrelevant, this one (may) still maintain its relevancy as the good forum-ers battle the evil Line 136, the nefarious Server Overload and the despicable download times.

Or, if the mods want to close this, that's okay too. (I'm rather surprised that this thread survived 0.24's release, and it may have been in error.)
